title: Global hotel chains checking in to India with new brands following pandemic years
description: US hospitality company Hilton this week announced the launch of its first Waldorf Astoria hotel in India in Jaipur. Spanning 22 acres with 51 pool villas and 174 guest rooms, it is scheduled to open in 2027.
